body: For you, impending death is a call to wrath.
name: Deathless Initiate
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Wounds and Vigor/Wounds and Vigor Variant Feats/Deathless Initiate

sections.body: Str 13, Con 13, Diehard, Endurance, base attack bonus +6, orc or half-orc.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: You are not staggered when your wound points reach your wound threshold, but you lose 1 wound point if you take any action during your turn. You only take 1 wound point each round when you take actions. Furthermore, you gain a +2 bonus on melee attacks and damage rolls when your wound points are at or below your wound threshold.
sections.name: Benefit
